## PointValues.removeTag() method

Removes a tag with the specified name if it exists; otherwise, it does nothing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeTag(name: string): PointValues;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the tag to be removed. |

**Returns:**

[PointValues](./influxdb3-client.pointvalues.md)
